name: Combat Tested: Sandbox
description: At some point in our lives, we all try to move things with our mind, some people give up on that dream, others don’t. Tell you what though, that dream can now become reality, in virtual reality! Combat Tested gives you the ability to use telekinesis, but you’ve also got some kick-ass swords you can use to cut through almost anything. The cool thing about these swords is that they slice through obstacles in real time, meaning that you can cut objects any way you want.
